content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a Google search command for "identifying trees of Michigan pdf". The search returned several resources including a revised 2022 edition of the guide from Michigan State University Extension, a PDF on tree identification basics in Michigan, and a guide to Michigan\'s species from the Michigan Department of Natural Resources. The search also found a tree identification guide from the University of Michigan Press.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.canr.msu.edu/resources/identifying-trees-of-michigan-e2332-revised-2022", "question": "How can I download the PDF guide?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: To download the PDF guide on identifying trees of Michigan, one can click on the "DOWNLOAD FILE" link provided in the text. \n \n Links: [\'\\n\\n\\n (https://msu.edu/)\', \'MSU Extension (https://www.canr.msu.edu/outreach/about/home_page)\', \'Natural Resources (https://www.canr.msu.edu/natural_resources/index)\', \'Programs (https://www.canr.msu.edu/natural_resources/programs)\', \'Experts (https://www.canr.msu.edu/natural_resources/experts)\']'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "wget https://www.canr.msu.edu/resources/identifying-trees-of-michigan-e2332-revised-2022/download -O Trees_of_MI.pdf"}}}'}]
"""
